Welcome.1: Welcome to Soudwave! If you are here to learn about the basics of Music you are at the right place.
Welcome.2: To navigate the lessons look into the dropdown the menu name lessons.
Welcome.3: At SoundWave we are commited to helping you grew your interest in music. If you enjoy your free online lessons, feel free to sign up for in class lessons.
